— <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> absolute [[Gen.19.26|Gen 19:26]] +; construct [[Lev.2.13|Lev 2:13]] — ***salt*** for seasoning food [[Job.6.6|Job 6:6]] offering [[Lev.2.13|Lev 2:13]] (3 t. in verse) compare [[Ezek.43.24|Ezek 43:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרִית מֶ֫לַח‎</span> [[Num.18.19|Num 18:19]]; [[2Chr.13.5|2Chr 13:5]] (compare [[Lev.2.13|Lev 2:13]] see [[BDB#Di|Di]]); used in purifying waters [[2Kgs.2.20|2Kgs 2:20]]; [[2Kgs.2.21|2Kgs 2:21]] strewn on site of devoted city [[Judg.9.45|Judg 9:45]] compare [[Zeph.2.9|Zeph 2:9]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכְרֵהמֿ‎</span>) [[Deut.29.22|Deut 29:22]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּפְרִית‎</span>); produced in marshes reserved for purpose [[Ezek.47.11|Ezek 47:11]] pillar of salt <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְצִיב מ‎</span> [[Gen.19.26|Gen 19:26]] usually in combination <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמֶּלַח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָם (ֿׅ‎</span> [[Gen.14.3|Gen 14:3]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶ֫מֶק הַשִּׂדִּים‎</span>), [[Num.34.3|Num 34:3]];
